titles.title: Sunshine on the Federal Open Market Committee Act
To amend title 5, United States Code, to clarify that the Government in the Sunshine Act applies to the Federal Open Market Committee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

action.text: Re-referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 2/11/1997--Introduced. Sunshine on the Federal Open Market Committee Act - Amends the Government in the Sunshine Act to make it applicable to the Federal Open Market Committee.
